title: Intermediate-Level Chinese Classifier Intensive Learning Course Utilizing Reflective Feedback

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese Grammar and Recognition of Over 50 Fundamental Classifiers
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital whiteboards and tablet PCs

learning_goals: Learners can select 20 specific classifiers contextually with 90% accuracy
Learners can establish correction strategies with 85% accuracy through self-analysis when classifier errors occur
Learners can verbally explain classifier usage rules and achieve clarity scores of 4 or higher (out of 5) during peer evaluations

resources: Access to digital taxonomy practice platform

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
